name: Security & Compliance Assessment
description: Government-grade security evaluation ensuring NIST AI RMF compliance and U.S. EO 14110 adherence. Maintains complete audit trails and provenance verification.

criteria.name: Data Integrity
criteria.description: Submission maintains data integrity and authenticity

criteria.name: Access Control
criteria.description: Proper authorization and access controls applied

criteria.name: Audit Trail
criteria.description: Complete audit trail maintained throughout process
